summary.note: All high/critical findings fixed in v1.0.347 before shipping

findings.title: || vs ?? for coverageTarget allows 0 to be overridden
findings.fix: Changed || to ?? and default from 80 to 90

findings.title: YAML frontmatter injection via unsanitized title containing double quotes
findings.fix: Added .replace(/"/g, "'") to all title fields in YAML frontmatter

findings.title: Rename can silently overwrite existing file belonging to different story
findings.fix: Added fs.stat check before rename to skip if destination exists

findings.title: coverageTarget default 80 vs 90 inconsistency
findings.fix: Changed default from 80 to 90 to match template-creator

findings.title: readConfig catch silently swallows malformed JSON errors
findings.fix: Added JSON parse error detection and warning log

findings.title: BRACKET_PLACEHOLDER regex overly broad, matches markdown links
findings.fix: Added negative lookahead (?!\() to exclude markdown link brackets

findings.title: slugifyTitle returns empty string for unicode/all-special/empty titles
findings.note: Edge case unlikely in practice - titles always have ASCII content from spec parser

findings.title: Template guard returns success:true with empty featureId and non-empty errors
findings.note: Intentional - template skip is a successful operation (skip, don't fail)
